thread.section_title: MiniInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 MiniInTheBox 的点评意见 | miniinthebox.com
thread.title: Ronald Wiseman
thread.title_full: MiniInTheBox 的点评人 Ronald Wiseman

author: Ronald Wiseman
title: Ronald Wiseman
text:
Paid for expedited shipping, and was led to believe, that we would receive our mouse that we ordered within 2-3 business days. We found out Saturday and Sunday are not business days for SF Express, the place used for shipping by MiniInTheBox. After purchase the shipping in email changed from 2-3 business days to 2-4. First deception. Well, the product was shipped, Feb 23rd 2017, according to the email MiniInTheBox sent. This is March 1st 2017. Which is 4 business days. Cannot find answer to this question. Who does sf express use to deliver the product, I ordered from your site, to me, in Abilene, Texas? Can you please find out why the expedited shipment has not yet arrived, where it is at, and what courier service will deliver to me? I will also be placing this in my review, along with the answer I receive from MiniInTheBox. Now MiniIntheBox replied it will be a week. How can I believe that? Not trustworthy :(
Update: Received package march 2,2017. Customer service was helpful and courteous. They also said the will fix shipping issues on site. Product is a great mouse.
